ygData.subject: Re: Charred Guardian Shield and Shining Star
ygData.msgSnippet: prolly a faction thing is why they wouldn t let you train.....but it s dmg 6, atk 28....there s better ones out there, but this is a decent weapon for the
ygData.messageBody:
prolly a faction thing is why they wouldn't let you train.....but it's dmg 6,
atk 28....there's better ones out there, but this is a decent weapon for the
level quest it is

(\/)ystix Spellchaser
lv 45 <yes i made it...welcome to hell 4>
human cleric of The Rathe

> From: "Alvarez, Ruben (consultant)" <ruben.alvarez@...>
>
> One quick question about the quest. It starts in Qeynos clerics guild?
> Last time I went there they wouldnt allow to train me because I am a High
> elf. Guess they are jelouse of me. Also what are the stats of this weapon
> thanks.
>
> Qanin Skywanderer
> 22nd Circle
>
